recipe.title: Cinnamon-Sugar Apple Rings
ingredients: 1 1/2 tablespoons sugar combined with 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon
instructions: Set broiler rack about 4 inches from heat and preheat broiler. Core apples and cut crosswise into 1/4-inch rings, discarding ends. Brush rings with butter on both sides and arrange in one layer in a shallow baking pan. Broil apple rings until edges just begin to turn golden, about 5 minutes. Sprinkle rings, evenly with cinnamon sugar and broil until glazed and golden, about 2 minutes more.
